main.firstP: Student at Polytech Nice-Sophia in Computer Science. Mainly interested in Cybersecurity, and Software Development. I also enjoy traveling and exploring new technologies.
main.secondP: Starting soon a new adventure as an apprentice developer at Amadeus on the Sophia Antipolis site.

LutinVSMonstres.title: Lutin VS Monstres
LutinVSMonstres.description: This project was developed for the S1.01 project at the IUT of Nice. The goal was to create a game where a lutin has to avoid monsters in a grid by using movements written in a file.

Pokae.title: Pokae
Pokae.description: In the context of the S2.01 project during the second semester of BUT Informatique, we had to create a Pokemon fight game with a console interface. The player can choose his pokemons and fight against another player or a bot based on different algorithms.

StitchLand.title: StitchLand
StitchLand.description: This project was carried out as part of the mobile development resource during my fourth semester of BUT Informatique. The goal was to create an e-commerce application using various useful and interesting technologies. In our shop, we sell several types of teddy bears, each with its own characteristics.

MozaicGenerator.title: Mozaic Generator
MozaicGenerator.description: This little project was done for the Artificial Intelligence course during my fourth semester of BUT Informatique. The goal was to create a little program that generates a mosaic from a picture with a specific size of blocks. Each block of the main picture will be another picture which matches the best with the color of the block.

Mangattack.title: Mangattack
Mangattack.description: This project was developed on my own and aims to create a manga shop where users can buy mangas and read them online (not for real). A main page allows users to see the latest mangas and the most popular ones. They can also click on a manga to see its details. It also includes an admin page, a cart system and a login system.

PersonalPortfolio.title: Personal Portfolio
PersonalPortfolio.description: This project is my personal portfolio and it allows people who don't know me to discover my skills, my experiences, my projects, my hobbies and some other information about me. It can be used on any device and is fully responsive and finally it also allows people to contact me by sending me an email.

Citadels.title: Citadels
Citadels.description: This educational project, developed for the PS5 course at Polytech Nice-Sophia, aims to recreate the famous Citadels game and all its features in a simplified version without a graphical interface and playable only by bots.

Klamar.title: Klamar
Klamar.description: This project was done for the PS6 course at Polytech Nice-Sophia. The goal was to create a website to help people with Alzheimer's disease by providing them the possibility to play a quiz (and 2 other surprise games) to stimulate their memory.

3-monthInternshipasaDevOpsattheMediterra.title: 3-month Internship as a DevOps at the Mediterranean Institute of ProtonTherapy in Nice.
3-monthInternshipasaDevOpsattheMediterra.description: Implementation of scripts designed to deploy containers on various operating systems, streamlining the continuous integration setup for the institute's software on these platforms.

Travelling.title: Travelling
Travelling.description: I love travelling and discovering new places.

Japan.title: Japan
Japan.description: I love so much manga and food from Japan.
